item.title: 罗马尼亚总统确认竞选下一任北约领导人
item.description: 罗马尼亚总统克劳斯-约哈尼斯确认将接任下一任北大西洋公约组织（North Atlantic Treaty Organization）领导人，并表示北大西洋公约组织（North Atlantic Treaty Organization）需要一个 "全新的视角"，需要来自东翼的领导人。【原文：Romanian President Klaus Iohannis confirmed his bid to take over as the next North Atlantic Treaty Organization chief, saying the military alliance needs a “fresh perspective” with leadership from its eastern flank.】

item.title: 波多黎各电力局计划发行的 "涡轮 "债券被视为公用事业公司的蓝图
item.description: 波多黎各破产电力局提出的债务重组计划包括一种烟草清偿债务中常见的融资方式，可作为其他电力公司寻求融资以满足资本需求的蓝本。【原文：The debt-restructuring plan put forward by Puerto Rico’s bankrupt power authority includes a type of financing common among tobacco-settlement debt that may serve as a blueprint for other utilities seeking to raise money to meet capital needs.】

item.title: 阿里尔投资公司的罗杰斯说：股市已经到了调整的时候了
item.description: 阿里尔投资公司（Ariel Investments）的创始人小约翰-罗杰斯（John Rogers Jr.）正确预测了美国将在 2023 年避免经济衰退以及股市的强劲反弹，他认为，股市调整的时机已经成熟，由 "华丽七侠 "推动的反弹已经明显过度。【原文：The stock market is ripe for a correction with the Magnificent Seven-fueled rally significantly overdone, according to Ariel Investments’ founder John Rogers Jr., who correctly forecast the US avoiding a recession in 2023 and the market’s buoyant rally.】

item.title: 冰岛将在气候行动计划实施六年后首次推出绿色产品
item.description: 在制定气候行动计划六年后，以及在以欧元为单位的银团债务交易三年后，冰岛正计划出售其首笔绿色债券。【原文：Six years after establishing a climate action plan and three years since it syndicated a debt deal in euros, Iceland is planning to sell its debut green bond.】

item.description: 阿彻-丹尼尔斯-米德兰公司（Archer-Daniels-Midland Co.【原文：The compensation packages awarded to Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. executives that were closely tied to the performance of the nutrition division still stand, even after the company announced on Tuesday several years of internal earnings adjustments following a financial probe.】

item.title: 智利降息的赌注再次转移，目前降息幅度较小
item.description: 智利经济学家打赌，比索疲软和连续的通胀意外将迫使央行在下个月放慢降息步伐。【原文：Chile economists are betting a weaker peso and back-to-back inflation surprises will force the central bank to slow the pace of interest rate cuts next month.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊认为没有理由上调 S&P 500 指数的目标值
item.description: 当华尔街的众多预测者纷纷上调对美股的乐观预期时，摩根士丹利的迈克-威尔逊（Mike Wilson）却不为所动，他认为在缺乏广泛盈利增长的情况下，没有理由上调其前景预期。【原文：As a flurry of Wall Street forecasters bump up their optimism toward US stocks in lockstep, Morgan Stanley’s Mike Wilson won’t budge, arguing he sees no justification to upgrade his outlook given an absence of broad earnings growth.】

item.title: 安哥拉计划出售外币债券以提高外汇流动性
item.description: 安哥拉政府正准备出售外币债券，因为这个产油国正试图增加经济中的美元供应，缓解当地货币宽扎的压力。【原文：Angola’s government is preparing the sale of foreign currency bonds as the oil-producing nation tries to increase the supply of dollars in the economy and ease the pressure on the local currency, the kwanza.】

item.title: 前华尔街银行家在纽约民主党初选中向 AOC 发起挑战
item.description: 在 6 月 25 日的纽约民主党初选中，一名华尔街资深人士向美国众议员亚历山德里亚-奥卡西奥-科特兹发起了一场千载难逢的挑战，这也是她四年来面临的第一场党内斗争。【原文：A Wall Street veteran is mounting a long-shot challenge to US Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez in New York’s June 25 Democratic primary, marking the first intra-party battle she’s faced in four years.】

item.title: 海盗登上索马里沿海商船
item.description: 一艘孟加拉国散装商品运输船在距离索马里海岸约 600 英里处被武装人员登上，这是该国附近海盗活动死灰复燃的最新事件。【原文：A Bangladeshi bulk commodity carrier was boarded by armed men about 600 miles off the coast of Somalia, the latest incident to mark a resurgence of piracy near the country.】

item.title: 阿根廷不提供比索债券看跌期权阻碍债务互换
item.description: 据两位直接知情人士透露，阿根廷央行没有为政府本周在创纪录的债务互换中出售的比索债券提供看跌期权，此举阻碍了私人银行参与这笔交易。【原文：Argentina’s central bank isn’t offering put options for peso bonds the government is selling this week in a record debt swap, a move that’s discouraged private banks from participating in the deal, according to two people with direct knowledge.】

item.description: 纽约社区银行公司（New York Community Bancorp Inc.【原文：New York Community Bancorp Inc. completed a deal to raise more than $1 billion of capital through an equity investment by backers led by former US Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin.】

item.title: 房地产和基础设施亏损削弱安大略省教师的回报率
item.description: 安大略省教师养老金计划去年的收益率为 1.9%，远远低于其基准，原因是信贷和股票的强劲业绩被硬资产的损失所掩盖。【原文：Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan gained 1.9% last year, underperforming its benchmark by a wide margin, as strong results in credit and stocks were overshadowed by losses in hard assets.】

item.title: 交易员解读最新美国通胀报告，黄金止跌回升
item.description: 由于交易商在消化一份关键的美国通胀报告，以寻找美联储何时可能开始降息的迹象，黄金收窄了早些时候的跌幅。【原文：Gold pared earlier losses as traders digested a key US inflation report for indications of when the Federal Reserve may start cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 韩国当局调查 Petchems 生产商的石脑油进口情况
item.description: 韩国当局正在调查该国进口的石脑油（一种塑料制造原料）的来源，重点是俄罗斯的供应。【原文：South Korean authorities are investigating the origins of the nation’s imports of naphtha, a plastics-making ingredient, with a focus on Russian supplies.】

item.title: SAP、西门子能源掩盖德国盈利下滑的事实
item.description: 德国基准 DAX 指数在 3 月初创下的历史最高点附近徘徊，投资者可能会认为这个欧洲最大经济体的企业正在全力以赴。【原文：Investors glancing at Germany’s benchmark DAX Index, hovering near a record high reached earlier in March, might be forgiven for thinking companies in Europe’s largest economy are firing on all pistons.】

item.title: 津巴布韦称炙热的厄尔尼诺模式导致玉米作物枯萎
item.description: 津巴布韦警告说，由于炙热的厄尔尼诺天气模式，种植玉米的农田减少了 12%，这威胁到该国的主食，并可能引发价格飙升和社会动荡。【原文：Zimbabwe warned that farmland planted with corn has shrunk by 12% because of scorching El Niño weather patterns, threatening the nation’s food staple and potentially triggering surging prices and social unrest.】

item.title: 伊拉克继续超额抽油，欧佩克石油供应削减陷入僵局
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）最新的石油供应削减计划停滞不前，原因是经常藐视该组织协议的伊拉克连续第二个月产量超过配额。【原文：OPEC’s latest oil supply cuts stalled as Iraq — which has often flouted the group’s agreements — produced above its quota for a second month.】

item.description: Signa Development Selection AG 是 Rene Benko 破产的房地产集团中两个主要单位中较小的一个，该公司在重组方案中向债权人返还 30% 的资金。【原文：Signa Development Selection AG, the smaller of two main units in Rene Benko’s insolvent property group, is offering creditors 30% of their money back in a restructuring proposal.】

item.title: 瑞典央行行长希望尽量减少比特币在金融领域的应用
item.description: 瑞典央行行长试图让比特币交易远离该国的金融体系，并在加密货币创下历史新高后就潜在的损失发出警告。【原文：Sweden’s central bank governor seeks to keep Bitcoin trading away from the country’s financial system, warning about potential losses after the crypto currency has reached new all-time highs.】

item.title: BAT 出售 21 亿美元 ITC 后开始回购
item.description: Lucky Strike 香烟制造商英美烟草公司（British American Tobacco Plc）计划出售印度合作伙伴 ITC Ltd. 多达 21 亿美元的股份，此举将有助于该公司向股东返还现金并投资于自身业务。【原文：British American Tobacco Plc, the maker of Lucky Strike cigarettes, plans to sell as much as $2.1 billion of shares in Indian partner ITC Ltd. in a move that will help it return cash to shareholders and invest in its business.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 8920 亿美元财富基金加大私人信贷押注
item.description: 阿布扎比 8920 亿美元的主权财富基金正在加大对房地产私人信贷基金的投入，这是财大气粗的中东投资者希望在该资产类别中发挥关键作用的最新迹象。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s $892 billion sovereign wealth fund is upping its commitment to a real estate private credit fund, the latest sign that deep-pocketed Middle Eastern investors are looking to play a pivotal role in the asset class.】

item.title: StanChart 肯尼亚分公司利润飙升，将派发创纪录股息
item.description: 渣打银行肯尼亚有限公司（Standard Chartered Bank Kenya Ltd.）在削减政府债务投资、专注于贷款和财富管理业务的决定取得成效后，提议派发创纪录的股息。【原文：Standard Chartered Bank Kenya Ltd. has proposed a record dividend after its decision to slash investment in government debt and focus on its lending and wealth business paid off.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在关键的 CPI 数据公布之前，股市上涨，美国银行上调了对美国盈利增长的展望，而杰米-戴蒙戳破了对软着陆的乐观情绪。【原文：Good morning. Stocks rise before key CPI data, Bank of America upgrades its outlook for US earnings growth while Jamie Dimon punctures optimism over a soft landing. — David Goodman】

item.title: 会计调查后，ADM 修订内部销售年限
item.description: Archer-Daniels-Midland 公司在对其财务报告进行内部调查后，修订了过去三年的分部间销售额，并披露了与动物营养部门有关的 1.37 亿美元减值费用。该公司股价在早盘交易中上涨。【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. revised its intersegment sales for the last three years following an internal probe into its financial reporting and disclosed a $137 million impairment charge related to its animal nutrition unit. The shares rose in early trading.】

item.title: EQT开始评估投资者对新亚洲收购基金的兴趣
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，EQT AB 正在筹建一个新的专注于亚洲的收购基金，目前正处于评估投资者兴趣的早期阶段。【原文：EQT AB is targeting raising a new Asia-focused buyout fund and is in the early stages of gauging investor interest, according to people familiar with the matter.】
